org.apache.hc.client5.http.nio.ManagedAsyncClientConnection

  • Packages that use ManagedAsyncClientConnection 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hc.client5.http.impl.nio
    Client connection management functions based the asynchronous connection management APIs.
    org.apache.hc.client5.http.nio
    Connection management APIs based on the asynchronous I/O model.
